item.title: Continously updated crime report draft criminal RICO case targeting McDonald’s Corporation and its accomplices
item.description: Excerpts from Draft Number 27. The content I am currently publishing online comprises only about one tenth of the entirety of Draft Number 27. TABLE OF CONTENTS {#table-of-contents} (I) Introduction: This Crime Report is Written Under Duress (I)(A) Witness Tampering and the (Death?) Threats I Have Received (I)(B) The Christian Duty to Report Wrongdoing (I)(C) Key Witness, Analyst, Whistleblower, and Now Whistleblower x 2 (II) How Does the McDonald’s Frauds Scandal Compare to the Volkswagen Emissions Scandal: a Call For Equitable Accountability
